com.mobivery.mvymaps
Class MVYMapView

java.lang.Object
  MapView
      com.mobivery.mvymaps.MVYMapView

public class MVYMapView
extends MapView

MVYMapView Extended MapView to simplify management of POIs, Balloons and Location Listener

Author:
Pepe

Method Detail

addPoi

public void addPoi(GeoPoint point,
                   Drawable customMarker,
                   java.lang.String title,
                   java.lang.String snnipet,
                   java.lang.Object customObject)
Add a POI marker to this map with a marker image, title, snnipet and a custom Object. Use this method and the MVYMapViewPoiDelegate to work with balloons

Parameters:
point -
customMarker -
title -
snnipet -
customObject - use this to store information associated to this POI, returned through methods of MVYMapViewPoiDelegate
